full_summary:
# ServerTech Power Distribution Units Solicitation

**Official Solicitation Title:**
ServerTech Power Distribution Units or equivalent for Department of National Defence

**Solicitation Number:**
BPM021291/26302
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Publication Date:** April 18, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** May 17, 2024 2:00 pm EST

**Overview:**
The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is inviting eligible suppliers to submit a proposal for the purchase of ServerTech Power Distribution Units or equivalent for the Department of National Defence.

**Details:**

* **Goods and Services Classification:**
	+ Automatic Data Processing Equipment, System Configuration (GSIN: N7010)
* **Regions of Opportunity:**
	+ Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:**
	+ Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* **Trade Agreements:**
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Javier Ventura
	+ Phone: 343-576-9329
	+ Fax: 343-576-9329

**Instructions:**

* Bidders must register in the SSC P2P portal to access the solicitation and submit a proposal.
* Register at [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login).
* Please refer to the solicitation documents for complete instructions.

**Related Documents:**

* Amendment 002: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/F8D0EAB7-5042-4668-87EF-E97A96BC6382](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/F8D0EAB7
